channel.title: Magics broke
channel.description: can anyone give me the full magic codes as mine dont work, they will not cast unless your stood on top of the monster or player please post here[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 05:45:48 AM[/size][hr]please post ur ancient magic please and perferabbly one that dosent take runes

item.title: Magics broke
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

youre missing something
do you have this in your client? iuf not add it above all your magic on players magic

public void AttackMage(int index) { int playerIndex = index; //inStream.readSignedWordA(); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("d4rk n0v4")){ println_debug("playerIndex: "+playerIndex+" spellID: "+spellID);} client castOnPlayer = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex]; setAnimation(711); int EnemyX = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absX; int EnemyY = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].absY; int EnemyHP = server.playerHandler.players[playerIndex].playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; int heal = 0; int myHP = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; int hitDiff = 0; int mageXP = 0;

Read full topic

item.title: Magics broke
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_n0v4 d4rk n0v4
item.description:
@d4rk_n0v4 wrote:

here use these all working rush - burst - blitz - barrage + hits and lvls are almost the same like in rs
ps use them on a server with max lvl 99-100 or you might need to edit the lvls

if(spellID == 12861) {// Ice Rush if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 58) { stillgfx(361, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(18); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((34*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); setAnimation(1978); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 57) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 58 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12939) {// Smoke Rush if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 50) { stillgfx(385, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(15); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((30*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("you posion the ememy"); sendMessage("you have been posioned"); setAnimation(1978); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 49) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 50 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12987) {// Shadow Rush if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 52) { stillgfx(379, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(16); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((31*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(1978); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 51) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 52 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12901) {// Blood Rush if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 56) { stillgfx(373, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(17); NewHP += hitDiff / 2; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((33*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Your life has been drained!"); sendMessage("You drain the enemys life and add it to yours."); setAnimation(1978); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 55) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 56 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12881) {// Ice Burst if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 70) { stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(22); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((40*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); setAnimation(1979); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 69) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 70 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12963) {// Smoke Burst if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 62) { stillgfx(389, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(19); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((36*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("you posion the ememy"); sendMessage("you have been posioned"); setAnimation(1979); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 61) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 62 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 13011) {// Shadow Burst if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 64) { stillgfx(382, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((37*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(1979); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 63) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 64 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12919) {// Blood Burst if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 68) { stillgfx(376, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(21); NewHP += hitDiff / 2; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((39*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Your life has been drained!"); sendMessage("You drain the enemys life and add it to yours."); setAnimation(1979); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 67) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 68 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12871) {// Ice Blitz if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 82) { stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(26); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((46*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); setAnimation(1978); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 81) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 82 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12951) {// Smoke Blitz if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 74) { castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(23); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((42*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("you posion the ememy"); sendMessage("you have been posioned"); setAnimation(1978); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 73) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 74 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12999) {// Shadow Blitz if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 76) { castOnPlayer.stillgfx(381, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(24); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((43*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(1978); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 75) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 76 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12911) {// Blood Blitz if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 80) { castOnPlayer.stillgfx(375, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(25); NewHP += hitDiff / 2; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((45*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Your life has been drained!"); sendMessage("You drain the enemys life and add it to yours."); setAnimation(1978); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 79) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 80 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(35); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((52*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); setAnimation(1979); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12975) {// Smoke Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 86) { castOnPlayer.stillgfx(391, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(27); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((48*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("you posion the ememy"); sendMessage("you have been posioned"); setAnimation(1979); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 85) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 86 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 13023) {// Shadow Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 88) { castOnPlayer.stillgfx(383, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(28); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((49*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(1979); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 87) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 88 to cast this spell."); } } if(spellID == 12929) {// Blood Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 90) { castOnPlayer.stillgfx(377, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(29); NewHP += hitDiff / 2; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } updateRequired = true; castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((51*hitDiff), playerMagic); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("Your life has been drained!"); sendMessage("You drain the enemys life and add it to yours."); setAnimation(1979); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 91) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 92 to cast this spell."); } }
